name: Timer Animation
description:
How to create a timer animation in Figma using interactive components. Making use of interactive components to create a timer or countdown or stopwatch kind of animation in Figma. You can also use this same method for scorecards on game prototyping.

#InteractiveComponents #TimerAnimation #FigmaTutorialSeries


Full Tutorial Youtube Link: https://youtu.be/foHZDp8z3lI
